content.prompt:
Wikimedia Commons

Which of the following characteristics helps attribute this work to Katsushika Hokusai?

choices.label: The expressiveness of the figures in the wind
The alternating, horizontal bands of blue and green
The inclusion of a view of Mount Fuji in the background
The subtle gradation of color in the background and sky

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Attribute a work of art to a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
